Pre-Game Insights: The Chicago Cubs and Ian Happ will take on the Philadelphia Phillies and Nicholas Castellanos on Tuesday at 6:40 p.m. ET, in the second game of a three-game series at Citizens Bank Park.
The Cubs are the favorite in this one, at -112, while the underdog Phillies have -108 odds to play spoiler.
Chicago is the favorite on the run line (-1.5 with +149 odds).
The over/under is 8 runs for the contest.
Cubs vs. Phillies Game Information & Odd: When: Tuesday, September 24, 2024 at 6:40 p.m. ET
Where: Citizens Bank Park in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
